overview: Join the dangerous world of Interpol agents and chase the slippery mafia boss Don through the spectacular city of Dubai. Let this thrilling and immersive 3D media tunnel ride take you on an epic chase as you rush past iconic skyscrapers and try to catch the ever elusive Don. Always a step ahead he taunts you with cunning moves and precision driving as the entire world follows your every move on the news. Will you be part of the heroic team that ultimately nabs the notorious Don or will he escape again only to emerge and continue his spree of audacious heists.
title: Don: The Chase
